title: Sawbones: The Hippocratic Oath
description:
We've all heard about the oath new doctors have to take before they get their first scalpel and weird head mirror thing. But has it always been the same? Did Hippocrates really make it up? Is "First, do no harm" part of it? We'll answer all that and more on this week's Sawbones.

Music: "Medicines" by The Taxpayers
author: sawbones@maximumfun.org (Justin McElroy)
